name: simple_circle
description: Draws a single red circle at the center.
code:
set color red
set size 10
draw circle x=50 y=50

name: row_of_squares
description: Creates a horizontal row of blue squares.

name: concentric_circles
description: Draws concentric circles centered at the origin.

name: diagonal_pattern
description: Places small orange circles along a diagonal line.

name: line_series
description: Draws a set of horizontal black lines.

name: target_pattern
description: Creates a target with three concentric circles in red, white, and blue.
code:
set color red
set size 30
draw circle x=50 y=50
set color white
set size 20
draw circle x=50 y=50
set color blue
set size 10
draw circle x=50 y=50

name: checkerboard
description: Forms a simple black checkerboard of squares.
code:
set color black
set size 5
repeat 4 {
  draw square x=10+$i*5 y=10
  draw square x=20+$i*10 y=10
  draw square x=10+$i*10 y=20
  draw square x=20+$i*5 y=20
}

name: spiral_like
description: A pseudo spiral pattern using circles of increasing size.

name: cross_shape
description: Draws a simple cross shape using lines.
code:
set color blue
set size 10
draw line x=0 y=0
draw line x=0 y=10
draw line x=10 y=0
draw line x=10 y=10

name: square_frame
description: Draws two nested red squares to form a frame.
code:
set color red
set size 20
draw square x=0 y=0
set size 10
draw square x=0 y=0

name: starburst
description: A radial starburst using lines in alternating colors.
code:
repeat 8 {
  set color yellow
  set size 15
draw line x=0 y=0
  set color orange
draw line x=5 y=5
}

name: grid_pattern
description: Generates a 3x3 grid of small black squares.
code:
set color black
set size 5
repeat 3 {
  draw square x=10+$i*5 y=10
  draw square x=20 y=10+$i*5
  draw square x=30 y=10+$i*5
}

name: flower_shape
description: Creates a simple flower shape from overlapping circles.

name: smiley_face
description: Draws a face outline with two eyes and a smile curve.
code:
set color yellow
set size 30
draw circle x=50 y=50
set color black
set size 5
draw circle x=40 y=60
draw circle x=60 y=60
set color red
set size 10
draw line x=40 y=40

name: diamond_shape
description: Composes a diamond shape using four triangles (approximated by lines).
code:
set color cyan
set size 10
draw line x=0 y=10
draw line x=10 y=0
draw line x=0 y=-10
draw line x=-10 y=0

name: wave_pattern
description: Repeats small sine-like lines horizontally to form a wave pattern.

name: nested_squares
description: Draws multiple nested squares with decreasing sizes.
code:
set color gray
repeat 5 {
  set size 30-$i*5
draw square x=0 y=0
  set size 20
  draw square x=0 y=0
}

name: ripple_effect
description: Creates a ripple-like effect with expanding circles.

name: triangle_fan
description: Simulates a triangle fan using lines radiating from the origin.

name: spiral_grid
description: Combines circular and square patterns in a nested spiral formation.
code:
set color magenta
set size 5
repeat 8 {
  draw circle x=5 y=5
  draw square x=10 y=10
  set size 7+$i*2
}

name: polar_spiral
description: Draws a true spiral pattern using trigonometric functions for x and y positions, creating a smooth outward rotation.

name: radial_burst_circles
description: Small circles placed radially with increasing radius.

name: phyllotaxis
description: Sunflower-style phyllotaxis using the golden angle.

name: rose_curve_rings
description: Rings placed along a rose curve (k=4).

name: grid_points
description: 9x9 grid of tiny points (circles) centered around origin.
code:
set color black
set size 1
repeat 9 {
  draw circle x=-40+$i*10 y=-40
  draw circle x=-40+$i*10 y=-30
  draw circle x=-40+$i*10 y=-20
  draw circle x=-40+$i*10 y=-10
  draw circle x=-40+$i*10 y=0
  draw circle x=-40+$i*10 y=10
  draw circle x=-40+$i*10 y=20
  draw circle x=-40+$i*10 y=30
  draw circle x=-40+$i*10 y=40
}

name: spiral_squares
description: Squares growing in size along a spiral path.

name: bullseye_triple
description: Three concentric circles forming a bullseye.
code:
set color firebrick
set size 30
draw circle x=0 y=0
set color white
set size 18
draw circle x=0 y=0
set color navy
set size 8
draw circle x=0 y=0

name: sine_wave_lines
description: Horizontal lines placed along a sine wave.

name: ring_of_squares
description: Squares arranged evenly around a ring.

name: flower_petals
description: Petal-like circles around a center.
code:
set color deeppink
set size 10
repeat 12 {
  draw circle x=cos($i*30)*40 y=sin($i*30)*40
}
set color black
set size 6
draw circle x=0 y=0

name: nested_grid_squares
description: A 5x5 grid made with nested repeats.
code:
set color dimgray
set size 6
repeat 5 {
  draw square x=-40+$i*20 y=-40
  draw square x=-40+$i*20 y=-20
  draw square x=-40+$i*20 y=0
  draw square x=-40+$i*20 y=20
  draw square x=-40+$i*20 y=40
}

name: spiral_rays
description: Short lines radiating and drifting outward.

name: offset_ripples
description: Two ripple rings offset from the origin.

name: lissajous_points
description: Samples a Lissajous curve with small circles.

name: square_spiral_stairs
description: Squares stepping outward in a quarter-turn pattern.
code:
set color slategray
set size 8
repeat 20 {
  draw square x=$i*6 y=0
  draw square x=$i*6 y=$i*4
  draw square x=0 y=$i*4
}

name: polar_dots_ringfade
description: Dots on a ring whose size changes with angle.

name: snowman
description: Three stacked circles with buttons, eyes, and a smile.
code:
set color skyblue
set size 20
draw circle x=0 y=-25
set size 14
draw circle x=0 y=-5
set size 10
draw circle x=0 y=10
set color black
set size 1.5
repeat 3 {
  draw circle x=-2+$i*2 y=-5
}
set size 1.5
draw circle x=-3 y=12
draw circle x=3 y=12
set size 6
draw line x=-3 y=6

name: robot_head
description: A square head, circular eyes, and a straight mouth.
code:
set color gray
set size 30
draw square x=0 y=0
set color black
set size 6
draw circle x=-10 y=10
draw circle x=10 y=10
set size 12
draw line x=-15 y=-5

name: traffic_light
description: Three lights stacked in a housing.
code:
set color black
set size 30
draw square x=0 y=10
set color red
set size 8
draw circle x=0 y=20
set color yellow
set size 8
draw circle x=0 y=10
set color green
set size 8
draw circle x=0 y=0

name: clock_face
description: Outer circle with 12 hour marks.
code:
set color black
set size 40
draw circle x=0 y=0
set size 2
repeat 12 {
  draw circle x=cos($i*30)*35 y=sin($i*30)*35
}

name: flower_of_life_hex
description: Center circle with six neighbors in a hex pattern.

name: orbiting_moons
description: A central body with small moons around a ring.
code:
set color slateblue
set size 10
draw circle x=0 y=0
set color lightgray
repeat 12 {
  set size 3+abs(sin($i*15))*2
  draw circle x=cos($i*30)*30 y=sin($i*30)*30
}

name: city_skyline
description: Simple skyline made from squares of varying size.

name: barcode_stripes
description: Evenly spaced horizontal bars.

name: caterpillar
description: Overlapping body segments with tiny eyes.
code:
set color forestgreen
set size 8
repeat 7 {
  draw circle x=-30+$i*10 y=0
}
set color black
set size 2
draw circle x=-35 y=8
draw circle x=-25 y=8

name: yin_yang_outline
description: Outline-only approximation with nested circles.
code:
set color black
set size 40
draw circle x=0 y=0
set size 20
draw circle x=0 y=10
set size 20
draw circle x=0 y=-10
set size 4
draw circle x=0 y=20
set size 4
draw circle x=0 y=-20

name: glasses
description: Two circular lenses connected by a bridge.
code:
set color black
set size 12
draw circle x=-15 y=0
draw circle x=15 y=0
set size 10
draw line x=-5 y=0

name: cloud_cluster
description: A fluffy cloud made from overlapping circles.
code:
set color lightgray
set size 12
draw circle x=-20 y=0
draw circle x=-8 y=8
draw circle x=5 y=6
draw circle x=18 y=0
set size 16
draw circle x=-2 y=0

name: ufo
description: Disc body with a small cabin and lights.
code:
set color silver
set size 20
draw circle x=0 y=0
set size 12
draw square x=0 y=5
set color lime
set size 2
repeat 5 {
  draw circle x=-8+$i*4 y=10
}

name: orbit_rings
description: Multiple rings of small dots at increasing radii.
